basics.name: Othman Shbeir
basics.label: AI & Data Scientist | Teaching Assistant | Computer Science Graduate
basics.summary: Computer Science Valedictorian and Teaching Assistant with a strong foundation in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, and Data Science. Experienced in designing machine learning models, developing intelligent systems, and mentoring students in advanced programming. Awarded multiple distinctions for academic excellence, research potential, and community service.
